org.openxava.web.portlets
Class HtmlPortlet

java.lang.Object
  GenericPortlet
      org.openxava.web.portlets.HtmlPortlet

public class HtmlPortlet
extends GenericPortlet

Return a HTML page.

You only need to define the url of the page.
In this way: 

  
  
    
      My page
      Page
      mypage
      
    
    
      Supported languages
      Languages
      en,es,de
The Languages param is optional.

Author:
Javier Paniza
